name: infra.m1sk9.dev devcontainer
postStartCommand: sh -lc "if [ -d /workspaces ] && [ -w /workspaces ]; then TARGET=/workspaces/docs/node_modules; elif [ -d /workspace ] && [ -w /workspace ]; then TARGET=/workspace/docs/node_modules; else TARGET=/tmp/node_modules; fi; mkdir -p \"$TARGET\" && chmod -R a+rwX \"$TARGET\" || true"
postCreateCommand: corepack prepare pnpm@latest --activate && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile || npm install
